snippet: Sloane Stephens, 20, who fell in straight sets in the second round at the Family Circle Cup, said the pressure from her surprising Australian Open showing has been overwhelming at times.
abstract: Sloane Stephens, 20, who fell in straight sets in the second round at the Family Circle Cup, said the pressure from her surprising Australian Open showing has been overwhelming at times.

headline.main: Stephens, After Another Early Exit, Tries to Maintain Focus Moving Forward
